data.name: About_Paragraph_3_2
data.value: . There are both video and audio episodes of the podcast coming out, meaning you can listen to it in your favorite player!

data.name: About_Paragraph_2
data.value: In it, I talk about IT news and gossip that caught my eye, personal life events, equipment and trinkets that I buy, movies, TV series and games, released content and upcoming plans.

data.name: About_Paragraph_1
data.value: Beard News is my personal podcast that is recorded online at the beginning of each month.

data.name: About_Paragraph_5
data.value: Also, by becoming a patron or sponsor you will get access to other bonuses: access to the private Discord server, where the online recording of the podcast takes place, to additional episodes of «АйТиБорода» show, etc.
